# PR Summary

When ConciseView formats an error in a script, it removes newlines from the error message to reflow the text content.  However, it expects that the message has the OS newline.  On Windows, if the message has a "\`n" instead of "\`r\`n" then it doesn't get formatted correctly.  Fix is to handle the OS newline case and then also remove remaining "\`n".

## PR Context

Fix https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/13584
